info.title: Accounting API
info.description:
# Introduction
The Xero Accounting API is a RESTful web service and uses the OAuth (v1.0a) protocol to authenticate 3rd party applications. The Accounting API exposes accounting and related functions of the main Xero application and can be used for a variety of purposes such as creating transactions like invoices and credit notes, right through to extracting accounting data via our reports endpoint.

get.summary: Retrieve the full chart of accounts

parameters.name: AccountID
parameters.description: The Xero generated unique identifier for an account

parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: The filename of the attachment to be downloaded

parameters.name: AccountID
parameters.description: The Xero generated unique identifier for an account

200.description: Successful response. The response message will contain the raw file content that was originally uploaded. The response won’t contain any xml or json encoded information

parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: The filename of the attachment being uploaded

parameters.name: AccountID
parameters.description: The Xero generated unique identifier for an account

parameters.name: Content
parameters.description: The raw content of the file to be uploaded

get.summary: Retrieve a collection of linked transactions (billable expenses)

parameters.name: SourceTransactionID
parameters.description: Filter by the SourceTransactionID. Get all the linked transactions created from a particular ACCPAY invoice

parameters.name: ContactID
parameters.description: Filter by the ContactID. Get all the linked transactions that have been assigned to a particular customer.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description: Filter by the combination of ContactID and Status. Get all the linked transactions that have been assigned to a particular customer and have a particular status e.g. GET /LinkedTransactions?ContactID=4bb34b03-3378-4bb2-a0ed-6345abf3224e&Status=APPROVED.

parameters.name: TargetTransactionID
parameters.description: Filter by the TargetTransactionID. Get all the linked transactions allocated to a particular ACCREC invoice.

post.summary: Create or update a linked transaction (billable expense)

get.summary: Retrieve a list of published GST reports (NZ) or BAS reports (AU)
Retrieve an individual BAS Report (AU) or GST Report (NZ)
Retrieve an Aged Payables report for a contact

parameters.name: contactID
parameters.description: ContactID for the contact you're running the report for

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Shows payments up to this date e.g. 2014-04-30. Defaults to end of the current month

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: Show all payable invoices from this date for contact

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: Show all payable invoices to this date for the contact

get.summary: Retrieve an Aged Receivables report for a contact

parameters.name: contactID
parameters.description: ContactID for the contact you're running the report for

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Shows payments up to this date e.g. 2014-04-30. Defaults to end of the current month

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: Show all receivable invoices from this date for contact

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: Show all receivable invoices to this date for the contact

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: trackingOptionID1
parameters.description: Run the balance sheet for a specific tracking option

parameters.name: trackingOptionID2
parameters.description: Run the balance sheet for a combination of two tracking options

parameters.name: standardLayout
parameters.description: If set to true no custom report layouts will be applied to response

parameters.name: paymentsOnly
parameters.description: Set this to true to get cash transactions only

parameters.name: bankAccountID
parameters.description: bankAccountID e.g. 5040915e-8ce7-4177-8d08-fde416232f18

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: periods
parameters.description: The number of periods to compare (integer between 1 and 12)

parameters.name: timeframe
parameters.description: The period size to compare to (1=month, 3=quarter, 12=year)

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: YYYY-MM-DD

get.summary: Retrieve a profit and loss report

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: trackingCategoryID
parameters.description: If you specify the trackingCategoryID parameter then the Profit and Loss Report will show figures for each of the options in the category as separate columns. See the Profit and Loss Report in Xero to learn more about this behavior when filtering by a tracking category.

parameters.name: trackingOptionID
parameters.description: If you specify this parameter in addition to the trackingCategoryID then just one option will be returned (i.e. 1 column only)

parameters.name: trackingCategoryID2
parameters.description: If you specify a second trackingCategoryID parameter then the Profit and Loss Report will show figures for each combination of options from the two categories as separate columns. See the Profit and Loss Report in Xero to learn more about this behaviour when filtering by two tracking categories.

parameters.name: trackingOptionID2
parameters.description: If you specify this parameter in addition to a second trackingCategoryID then just one option will be returned combined with the option/s from the first tracking category

parameters.name: standardLayout
parameters.description: If you set this parameter to "true" then no custom report layouts will be applied to response

parameters.name: paymentsOnly
parameters.description: Set this to true to get cash transactions only

parameters.name: Date
parameters.description: YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: paymentsOnly
parameters.description: Set this to true to get cash transactions only

parameters.name: reportYear
parameters.description: Year of the report e.g. 2013

get.summary: Retrieve a collection of tax rates
Retrieve a collection of tracking categories and options
Retrieve a tracking category and it's options

post.summary: Create or update a tracking category

put.summary: Add options to a tracking category

delete.summary: Delete an option from a tracking category

Code.description: Customer defined alpha numeric account code e.g 200 or SALES

Status.description: Accounts with a status of ACTIVE can be updated to ARCHIVED

Description.description: Description of the Account. Valid for all types of accounts except bank accounts

TaxType.description: Default tax rate for the account

EnablePaymentsToAccount.description: Describes whether account can have payments applied to it

ShowInExpenseClaims.description: Describes whether account code is available for use with expense claims

SystemAccount.description: If this is a system account then this element is returned. Note that non-system accounts may have this element set as either “” or null.

HasAttachments.description: Indicates if an account has an attachment

AppliedAmount.description: the amount being applied to the invoice

Date.description: The date the prepayment is applied YYYY-MM-DD (read-only). This will be the latter of the invoice date and the prepayment date.

AttachmentId.description: Xero generated unique identifier for attachment

Url.description: The URL to where the attachment is located

IncludeOnline.description: Determines whether the attachment is included with the online invoice

Balances.description: The raw AccountsReceivable (sales invoices) and AccountsPayable (bills) outstanding and overdue amounts, not converted to base currency

BankTransactionId.description: Xero generated unique identifier for bank transactions

IsReconciled.description: Indicates if transaction has been reconciled

Reference.description: Reference for the transaction. Only supported for SPEND and RECEIVE transactions

Date.description: Date bank transaction was made YYYY-MM-DD

Status.description: The status of the bank transaction

LineAmountTypes.description: Line amounts are exclusive of tax by default if you don’t specify this element

Url.description: URL link to a source document – shown as “Go to [appName]” in the Xero app

CurrencyCode.description: The currency that bank transaction has been raised in

CurrencyRate.description: The currency rate for a multicurrency bank transaction. If no rate is specified, the XE.com day rate is used.

SubTotal.description: Total of bank transaction excluding taxes

Totaltax.description: Total tax on the bank transaction

Total.description: Total of bank transaction tax inclusive (i.e. SubTotal + TotalTax). This will be ignored if it doesn’t equal the sum of the LineAmounts

PrepaymentID.description: Xero generated unique identifier for a Prepayment. This will be returned on BankTransactions with a Type of SPEND-PREPAYMENT or RECEIVE-PREPAYMENT

OverpaymentID.description: Xero generated unique identifier for an Overpayment. This will be returned on BankTransactions with a Type of SPEND-OVERPAYMENT or RECEIVE-OVERPAYMENT

HasAttachments.description: boolean to indicate if the bank transaction has an attachment

BankTransferId.description: Xero generated unique identifier for bank transfers

Date.description: Date bank transfer was made YYYY-MM-DD

CurrencyRate.description: The currency rate for a multicurrency bank transfer. If no rate is specified, the XE.com day rate is used.

FromBankTransactionID.description: The Bank Transaction ID for the source account

ToBankTransactionID.description: The Bank Transaction ID for the destination account

HasAttachments.description: boolean to indicate if the bank transaction has an attachment

SortOrder.description: Integer – ranked order of branding theme. The default branding theme has a value of 0

CreatedDateUTC.description: UTC timestamp of creation date of branding theme

AccountNumber.description: A user defined account number. This can be updated via the API and the Xero UI.

EmailAddress.description: Email address of contact person (umlauts not supported)

TaxNumber.description: Tax number of contact – this is also known as the ABN (Australia), GST Number (New Zealand), VAT Number (UK) or Tax ID Number (US and global) in the Xero UI depending on which regionalized version of Xero you are using.

AccountsReceivableTaxType.description: Default tax type used for contact on AR invoices

AccountsPayableTaxType.description: Default tax type used for contact on AP invoices

IsSupplier.description: Boolean that describes if a contact that has any AP invoices entered against them. Cannot be set via PUT or POST – it is automatically set when an accounts payable invoice is generated against this contact.

IsCustomer.description: Boolean that describes if a contact has any AR invoices entered against them. Cannot be set via PUT or POST – it is automatically set when an accounts receivable invoice is generated against this contact.

DefaultCurrency.description: Default currency for raising invoices against contact

SalesDefaultAccountCode.description: The default sales account code for contacts

PurchasesDefaultAccountCode.description: The default purchases account code for contacts

HasAttachments.description: A boolean to indicate if a contact has an attachment

ContactGroupID.description: Unique identifier for the contact group

Status.description: The status of the contact group

IncludeInEmails.description: Boolean to indicate whether contact should be included on emails with invoices etc.

Code.description: 3 letter alpha code for the currency

Date.description: The date the credit note is issued YYYY-MM-DD. If the Date element is not specified then it will default to the current date based on the timezone setting of the organisation

LineAmountTypes.description: How tax is applied on the line items

SubTotal.description: The subtotal of the credit note excluding taxes

TotalTax.description: The total tax on the credit note

Total.description: The total of the Credit Note(subtotal + total tax)

UpdatedDateUTC.description: UTC timestamp of last update to the credit note

CurrencyCode.description: Currency used for the Credit Note

FullyPaidOnDate.description: Date when credit note was fully paid

CreditNoteNumber.description: ACCRECCREDIT – Unique alpha numeric code identifying credit note (when missing will auto-generate from your Organisation Invoice Settings)

SentToContact.description: boolean to indicate if a credit note has been sent to a contact via the Xero app (currently read only)

CurrencyRate.description: The currency rate for a multicurrency invoice. If no rate is specified, the XE.com day rate is used

RemainingCredit.description: The remaining credit balance on the Credit Note

Allocations.description: Transactions the credit note has been allocated to

BrandingThemeID.description: The identifier for the branding theme applied to the credit note

HasAttachments.description: boolean to indicate if a credit note has an attachment

Date.description: The date the credit note is issued YYYY-MM-DD. If the Date element is not specified then it will default to the current date based on the timezone setting of the organisation

Total.description: The total of the Credit Note(subtotal + total tax)

AppliedAmount.description: The total applied to the invoice

CreditNoteNumber.description: ACCRECCREDIT – Unique alpha numeric code identifying credit note (when missing will auto-generate from your Organisation Invoice Settings)

EmployeeID.description:
The Xero identifier for an employee
e.g. 297c2dc5-cc47-4afd-8ec8-74990b8761e9

FirstName.description: First name of an employee (max length = 255)

LastName.description: Last name of an employee (max length = 255)

allOf.description:
Link to an external resource, for example, an employee record in an external system. You can specify the URL element.
The description of the link is auto-generated in the form “Go to <App name>”. <App name> refers to the Xero application name that is making the API call.

Receipts.description: The Receipts in the expense claim

ExpenseClaimID.description: Xero generated unique identifier for an expense claim

Payments.description: Payments applied to the expense claim

Status.description: Current status of an expense claim

Total.description: The total of an expense claim being paid

AmountDue.description: The amount due to be paid for an expense claim

AmountPaid.description: The amount still to pay for an expense claim

PaymentDueDate.description: The date when the expense claim is due to be paid YYYY-MM-DD

ReportingDate.description: The date the expense claim will be reported in Xero YYYY-MM-DD

InvoiceID.description: Xero generated unique identifier for invoice

InvoiceNumber.description:
User defined alphanumeric code for identifying invoices. 
- Unique for ACCREC but not for ACCPAY. 
- For ACCREC it will auto-generate when left blank. 
- For ACCPAY it displays as Reference in the UI.

DueDate.description: Date the invoice is due to be paid YYYY-MM-DD

LineAmountTypes.description: Line amounts are exclusive of tax by default if you don’t specify this element

BrandingThemeID.description: The identifier for the branding theme applied to the invoice

Url.description: URL link to a source document – shown as “Go to [appName]” in the Xero app

CurrencyCode.description: The currency that invoice has been raised in

CurrencyRate.description: The currency rate for a multicurrency invoice. If no rate is specified, the XE.com day rate is used.

SentToContact.description: Boolean to set whether the invoice in the Xero app should be marked as “sent”. This can be set only on invoices that have been approved

ExpectedPaymentDate.description: Shown on sales invoices (Accounts Receivable) when this has been set

PlannedPaymentDate.description: Shown on bills (Accounts Payable) when this has been set

Total.description: Total of Invoice tax inclusive (i.e. SubTotal + TotalTax). This will be ignored if it doesn’t equal the sum of the LineAmounts

TotalDiscount.description: Total of discounts applied on the invoice line items

AmountDue.description: Amount remaining to be paid on invoice

AmountPaid.description: Sum of payments received for invoice

FullyPaidOnDate.description: The date the invoice was fully paid. Only returned on fully paid invoices

AmountCredited.description: Sum of all credit notes, over-payments and pre-payments applied to invoice

HasAttachments.description: boolean to indicate if an invoice has an attachment

InvoiceID.description: Xero generated unique identifier for invoice

InvoiceNumber.description:
User defined alphanumeric code for identifying invoices. 
- Unique for ACCREC but not for ACCPAY. 
- For ACCREC it will auto-generate when left blank. 
- For ACCPAY it displays as Reference in the UI.

InventoryAssetAccountCode.description: The inventory asset account for the item. The account must be of type INVENTORY. The  COGSAccountCode in PurchaseDetails is also required to create a tracked item

Name.description: The name of the item (max length = 50)

IsSold.description: Boolean value, defaults to true. When IsSold is true the item will be available on sales transactions in the Xero UI. If IsSold is updated to false then Description and SalesDetails values will be nulled.

IsPurchased.description: Boolean value, defaults to true. When IsPurchased is true the item is available for purchase transactions in the Xero UI. If IsPurchased is updated to false then PurchaseDescription and PurchaseDetails values will be nulled.

Description.description: The sales description of the item

PurchaseDescription.description: The purchase description of the item

IsTrackedAsInventory.description: True for items that are tracked as inventory. An item will be tracked as inventory if the InventoryAssetAccountCode and COGSAccountCode are set.

TotalCostPool.description: The value of the item on hand. Calculated using average cost accounting.

QuantityOnHand.description: The quantity of the item on hand

UpdatedDateUTC.description: Last modified date in UTC format

ItemID.description: The Xero identifier for an Item

SourceID.description: The identifier for the source transaction (e.g. InvoiceID)

SourceType.description: The journal source type. The type of transaction that created the journal

LineAmount.description: Total for line. Debits are positive, credits are negative value

TaxType.description: Used as an override if the default Tax Code for the selected AccountCode is not correct.

Tracking.description: Optional Tracking Category. Any JournalLine can have a maximum of 2 TrackingCategory elements.

TaxAmount.description: The calculated tax amount based on the TaxType and LineAmount

Description.description: Description needs to be at least 1 char long. A line item with just a description (i.e no unit amount or quantity) can be created by specifying just a <Description> element that contains at least 1 character

UnitAmount.description: Lineitem unit amount. By default, unit amount will be rounded to two decimal places. You can opt in to use four decimal places by adding the querystring parameter unitdp=4 to your query. See the Rounding in Xero guide for more information.

AccountCode.description: The account that the lineitem is being coded to

LineItemID.description: The Xero generated identifier for a LineItem. If LineItemIDs are not included with line items in an update request then the line items are deleted and recreated.

TaxType.description: Used as an override if the default Tax Code for the selected <AccountCode> is not correct

TaxAmount.description: The tax amount is auto calculated as a percentage of the line amount based on the tax rate. This value can be overriden if the calculated TaxAmount is not correct.

LineAmount.description: The line amount reflects the discounted price if a DiscountRate has been used i.e LineAmount = Quantity * Unit Amount * ((100 – DiscountRate)/100)

DiscountRate.description: Percentage discount being applied to a line item (only supported on ACCREC invoices – ACC PAY invoices and credit notes in Xero do not support discounts

SourceTransactionID.description: Filter by the SourceTransactionID. Get all the linked transactions created from a particular ACCPAY invoice

SourceLineItemID.description: The line item identifier from the source transaction.

ContactID.description: Filter by the combination of ContactID and Status. Get all the linked transactions that have been assigned to a particular customer and have a particular status e.g. GET /LinkedTransactions?ContactID=4bb34b03-3378-4bb2-a0ed-6345abf3224e&Status=APPROVED.

TargetTransactionID.description: Filter by the TargetTransactionID. Get all the linked transactions allocated to a particular ACCREC invoice

TargetLineItemID.description: The line item identifier from the target transaction. It is possible to link multiple billable expenses to the same TargetLineItemID.

LinkedTransactionID.description: The Xero identifier for an Linked Transaction e.g. /LinkedTransactions/297c2dc5-cc47-4afd-8ec8-74990b8761e9

Status.description: Filter by the combination of ContactID and Status. Get all the linked transactions that have been assigned to a particular customer and have a particular status e.g. GET /LinkedTransactions?ContactID=4bb34b03-3378-4bb2-a0ed-6345abf3224e&Status=APPROVED.

Type.description: This will always be BILLABLEEXPENSE. More types may be added in future.

UpdatedDateUTC.description: The last modified date in UTC format

SourceTransactionTypeCode.description: The Type of the source tranasction. This will be ACCPAY if the linked transaction was created from an invoice and SPEND if it was created from a bank transaction.

LineAmountTypes.description: Line amounts are exclusive of tax by default if you don’t specify this element

Url.description: Url link to a source document – shown as “Go to [appName]” in the Xero app

ShowOnCashBasisReports.description: Boolean – default is true if not specified

HasAttachments.description: Boolean to indicate if a manual journal has an attachment

JournalID.description: The Xero identifier for a Manual Journal

OnlineInvoiceUrl.description: The URL to view the online invoice

APIKey.description: Display a unique key used for Xero-to-Xero transactions

Name.description: Display name of organisation shown in Xero

PaysTax.description: Boolean to describe if organisation is registered with a local tax authority i.e. true, false

BaseCurrency.description: Default currency for organisation. See ISO 4217 Currency Codes

CountryCode.description: Country code for organisation. See ISO 3166-2 Country Codes

IsDemoCompany.description: Boolean to describe if organisation is a demo company.

OrganisationStatus.description: Will be set to ACTIVE if you can connect to organisation via the Xero API

RegistrationNumber.description: Shows for New Zealand, Australian and UK organisations

TaxNumber.description: Shown if set. Displays in the Xero UI as Tax File Number (AU), GST Number (NZ), VAT Number (UK) and Tax ID Number (US & Global).

SalesTaxBasis.description: The accounting basis used for tax returns

SalesTaxPeriod.description: The frequency with which tax returns are processed. See Sales Tax Period

DefaultSalesTax.description: The default for LineAmountTypes on sales transactions

DefaultPurchasesTax.description: The default for LineAmountTypes on purchase transactions

CreatedDateUTC.description: Timestamp when the organisation was created in Xero

ShortCode.description: A unique identifier for the organisation. Used for deep linking into Xero.

LineOfBusiness.description: Description of business type as defined in Organisation settings

ExternalLinks.description: Organisation profile links for popular services such as Facebook, Twitter, GooglePlus and LinkedIn. You can also add link to your website here. Shown if Organisation settings  is updated in Xero. See ExternalLinks below

allOf.description: Default payment terms for the organisation if set Terms below

Date.description: The date the overpayment is created YYYY-MM-DD

LineAmountTypes.description: Line amounts are exclusive of tax by default if you don’t specify this element

SubTotal.description: The subtotal of the overpayment excluding taxes

TotalTax.description: The total tax on the overpayment

Total.description: The total of the overpayment (subtotal + total tax)

UpdatedDateUTC.description: UTC timestamp of last update to the overpayment

CurrencyRate.description: The currency rate for a multicurrency overpayment. If no rate is specified, the XE.com day rate is used

RemainingCredit.description: The remaining credit balance on the overpayment

HasAttachments.description: boolean to indicate if a overpayment has an attachment

Date.description: The date the overpayment was made YYYY-MM-DD

Total.description: The total of the Overpayment (subtotal + total tax)

AppliedAmount.description: The total applied to the invoice

Account.description: The Account the payment was made from

Date.description: Date the payment is being made (YYYY-MM-DD)

CurrencyRate.description: Exchange rate when payment is received. Only used for non base currency invoices and credit notes.

Amount.description: The amount of the payment. Must be less than or equal to the outstanding amount owing on the invoice

Reference.description: An optional description for the payment

IsReconciled.description: An optional parameter for the payment. A boolean indicating whether you would like the payment to be created as reconciled when using PUT, or whether a payment has been reconciled when using GET

UpdatedDateUTC.description: UTC timestamp of last update to the payment

PaymentID.description: The Xero identifier for an Payment
The Xero identifier for an Payment

Date.description: Date the payment is being made (YYYY-MM-DD)

Amount.description: The amount of the payment. Must be less than or equal to the outstanding amount owing on the invoice

Date.description: The date the prepayment is created YYYY-MM-DD

LineAmountTypes.description: Line amounts are exclusive of tax by default if you don’t specify this element

SubTotal.description: The subtotal of the prepayment excluding taxes

TotalTax.description: The total tax on the prepayment

Total.description: The total of the prepayment(subtotal + total tax)

UpdatedDateUTC.description: UTC timestamp of last update to the prepayment

CurrencyRate.description: The currency rate for a multicurrency prepayment. If no rate is specified, the XE.com day rate is used

RemainingCredit.description: The remaining credit balance on the prepayment

HasAttachments.description: boolean to indicate if a prepayment has an attachment

Date.description: The date the prepayment is issued YYYY-MM-DD.

Total.description: The total of the Prepayment (subtotal + total tax)

AppliedAmount.description: The total applied to the invoice

UnitPrice.description: Unit Price of the item. By default UnitPrice is rounded to two decimal places. You can use 4 decimal places by adding the unitdp=4 querystring parameter to your request.

AccountCode.description: Default account code to be used for purchase of non-tracked items. Not applicable to the purchase details of tracked items

COGSAccountCode.description: Cost of goods sold account. Only applicable to the purchase details of tracked items.

TaxType.description: Used as an override if the default Tax Code for the selected AccountCode is not correct.

Date.description: Date purchase order was issued – YYYY-MM-DD. If the Date element is not specified then it will default to the current date based on the timezone setting of the organisation

DeliveryDate.description: Date the goods are to be delivered – YYYY-MM-DD

LineAmountTypes.description: Line amounts are exclusive of tax by default if you don’t specify this element

PurchaseOrderNumber.description: Unique alpha numeric code identifying purchase order (when missing will auto-generate from your Organisation Invoice Settings)

CurrencyCode.description: The currency that purchase order has been raised in

SentToContact.description: Boolean to set whether the purchase order should be marked as “sent”. This can be set only on purchase orders that have been approved or billed

DeliveryAddress.description: The address the goods are to be delivered to

AttentionTo.description: The person that the delivery is going to

Telephone.description: The phone number for the person accepting the delivery

DeliveryInstructions.description: A free text feild for instructions (500 characters max)

ExpectedArrivalDate.description: The date the goods are expected to arrive.

PurchaseOrderID.description: Xero generated unique identifier for purchase order

CurrencyRate.description: The currency rate for a multicurrency purchase order. As no rate can be specified, the XE.com day rate is used.

SubTotal.description: Total of purchase order excluding taxes

Total.description: Total of Purchase Order tax inclusive (i.e. SubTotal + TotalTax)

TotalDiscount.description: Total of discounts applied on the purchase order line items

HasAttachments.description: boolean to indicate if a purchase order has an attachment

LineAmountTypes.description: Line amounts are exclusive of tax by default if you don’t specify this element

Total.description: Total of receipt tax inclusive (i.e. SubTotal + TotalTax)

ReceiptID.description: Xero generated unique identifier for receipt

ReceiptNumber.description: Xero generated sequence number for receipt in current claim for a given user

HasAttachments.description: boolean to indicate if a receipt has an attachment

Url.description: URL link to a source document – shown as “Go to [appName]” in the Xero app

LineAmountTypes.description: Line amounts are exclusive of tax by default if you don’t specify this element

BrandingThemeID.description: Branding Theme to be applied to the invoice

CurrencyCode.description: The currency that invoice has been raised in

Status.description: One of the following : DRAFT or AUTHORISED

Total.description: Total of Invoice tax inclusive (i.e. SubTotal + TotalTax)

RepeatingInvoiceID.description: Xero generated unique identifier for repeating invoice template

HasAttachments.description: boolean to indicate if an invoice has an attachment

UpdatedDateUTC.description: The date and time the report was generated

Rows.description: The rows of the report that contain the data (including header rows)
The rows of the report (including header rows)

Cells.description: The cells that contain the data of the report

Value.description: The data displayed in the report

Attributes.description: AccountID that the Value relates to

Value.description: The AccountID that the Value relates to

UpdatedDateUTC.description: The date and time the report was generated
The date and time the report was generated

ReportAttribute.description: The attributes of the report (AU BAS Report only)

ReportField.description: The report fields that contain useful data

Description.example: Total salary, wages and other payments

UnitPrice.description: Unit Price of the item. By default UnitPrice is rounded to two decimal places. You can use 4 decimal places by adding the unitdp=4 querystring parameter to your request.

AccountCode.description: Default account code to be used for sale.

TaxType.description: Used as an override if the default Tax Code for the selected AccountCode is not correct .

Period.description: Integer used with the unit e.g. 1 (every 1 week), 2 (every 2 months)

Unit.description: One of the following : WEEKLY or MONTHLY

DueDate.description: Integer used with due date type e.g 20 (of following month), 31 (of current month)

DueDateType.description: Used with due date to describe when the invoice is due

StartDate.description: Date the first invoice of the current version of the repeating schedule was generated (changes when repeating invoice is edited)

NextScheduledDate.description: The calendar date of the next invoice in the schedule to be generated

EndDate.description: Invoice end date – only returned if the template has an end date set

TaxType.description: Tax Types – can only be used as the identifier on update calls

CanApplyToAssets.description: Boolean to describe if tax rate can be used for asset accounts

CanApplyToEquity.description: Boolean to describe if tax rate can be used for equity accounts

CanApplyToExpenses.description: Boolean to describe if tax rate can be used for expense accounts

CanApplyToLiabilities.description: Boolean to describe if tax rate can be used for liability accounts

CanApplyToRevenue.description: Boolean to describe if tax rate can be used for revenue accounts

IsCompound.description: Boolean to describe if Tax rate is compounded.Learn more

TrackingCategoryID.description: The Xero identifier for a tracking categorye.g. 297c2dc5-cc47-4afd-8ec8-74990b8761e9

Name.description: The name of the tracking category e.g. Department, Region (max length = 100)

Status.description: The status of a tracking category

TrackingOptionID.description: The Xero identifier for a tracking optione.g. ae777a87-5ef3-4fa0-a4f0-d10e1f13073a

Name.description: The name of the tracking option e.g. Marketing, East (max length = 50)

Status.description: The status of a tracking option

TrackingCategoryID.description: The identifier for the tracking category

Name.description: The name of the tracking category

Option.description: The name of the tracking option

UpdatedDateUTC.description: Timestamp of last change to user

IsSubscriber.description: Boolean to indicate if user is the subscriber

If-Modified-Since.name: If-Modified-Since
If-Modified-Since.description: A UTC timestamp (yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss) . Only invoices created or modified since this timestamp will be returned e.g. 2009-11-12T00:00:00

page.name: page
page.description: Page number e.g. page=1. Page size is 100. When using the page parameter full resource details will be returned (including line items).

offset.name: offset
offset.description: Offset by a specified journal number. e.g. journals with a JournalNumber greater than the offset will be returned.

paymentsOnly.name: paymentsOnly
paymentsOnly.description: Return results on a the cash basis

includeArchived.name: includeArchived
includeArchived.description: Include archived records in the response

unitdp.name: unitdp
unitdp.description: Determines the decimal places accepted/returned on the UnitAmount. UnitAmount is 2 decimal places by default but can be increased to 4 decimal places by supplying the unitdp=4 parameter.

summarizeErrors.name: summarizeErrors
summarizeErrors.description: If you plan to submit more than one entity per API call, we recommend that you append the summarizeErrors=false querystring to your API call. This ensures that every entity is returned back to you, each having their own status attribute.

Message.example: An error occurred in Xero. Check the API Status page for current service status. Contact the API support team at api@xero.com for more assistance.

404ErrorResponse.description: The resource you're looking for cannot be found
